name: Birthday Bliss
description: Create joyful birthday memories with our tailored event planning services. Let us make your special day truly magical!
longDescription: At Botanica Wedding, we specialize in creating unforgettable birthday celebrations filled with joy and magic. Our dedicated team of event planners is committed to making your special day a truly blissful experience. From selecting the perfect theme to organizing exciting activities and ensuring that every detail is just right, we've got you covered. Let us transform your birthday dreams into reality and create memories that will last a lifetime.

name: Anniversary Elegance
description: Celebrate your love story with enchanting anniversary events. Our expert planners ensure a day to remember.
address: Biltmore Estate, 1 Lodge Street, Asheville, North Carolina, 28803
longDescription: At Botanica Wedding, we specialize in crafting elegant and enchanting anniversary celebrations that honor your unique love story. Whether you're celebrating one year or fifty years together, our dedicated team will ensure that your special day is filled with love, joy, and unforgettable moments. From selecting the perfect venue to curating romantic decor and entertainment, we take care of every detail so you can focus on celebrating your cherished journey together.

name: Golden Anniversary Moments

longDescription: Reaching a 50-year milestone in your journey of love is a remarkable achievement, and it deserves a grand celebration. At Botanica Wedding, we specialize in creating golden anniversary moments that honor your enduring love story. From selecting elegant venues to arranging exquisite dining experiences and entertainment that resonates with your journey, we ensure your golden anniversary is filled with love and cherished memories.
